item.description: Will there be more 'Adventure Time' after the 'Distant Lands' finale, "Wizard City" airs on HBO Max? Have we seen the last of Jake and Finn? Although the series ran for nearly a decade on Cartoon Network, all good things must come to an end, and this became a reality when showrunners announced the series finale of Adventure Time in 2016.

item.title: Akeredolu Wanted My Emergence As Ondo Governor
item.description: The Ondo State Governor, Lucky Aiyedatiwa, has said his predecessor, the late Rotimi Akeredolu, had wanted him to be the next governor. The governor stated this at a meeting with the officials and the members of Lucky Aiyedatiwa Campaign Organisation Foot Soldiers in Akure on Saturday. He noted that his ambition to contest for governorship position was beyond the mandate of his joint ticket with the late Akeredolu but a sincere mission to transform Ondo State and uplift the standard of living of the people.

item.title: KQ to Lease 2 Jets to Congo Airways In Bid to Bolster Aviation Ties with DRC
item.description: The move fulfils an MoU signed between Kenya and DRC in April 2021 Kenya Airways CEO Allan Kilavuka said the deal will create a model for cooperation between the other African airlinesKQ has also commenced direct cargo flights from Johannesburg, South Africa to Lubumbashi, DRCNational carrier Kenya Airways (KQ) has entered into an aircraft lease agreement with Congo Airways and leased it two of its jets, TUKO.co.ke has learned. Under the deal, KQ will lease two Embraer E190 jets to Congo Airways, boosting domestic operations and flight frequencies in the Democratic Republic of Congo.

item.title: Gbajabiamilas Installation As Aare Baasofin Suspended
item.description: A planned chieftaincy title installation ceremony for the Speaker of the House of Representatives, Femi Gbajabiamila, has been put on hold till further notice. Naija News understands that the lawmaker was to be installed as the Aare Baasofin of Yorubaland (the Supreme Lawmaker of Yorubaland) in May 2022. However, the installation event has been suspended following the demise of a top Yoruba monarch, the Alaafin of Oyo, Oba Lamidi Adeyemi III.

item.title: Guy Gets Revenge on Bullies Who Mocked an Overweight Woman at the Gym
item.description: Bullies Who Mocked Overweight Woman at Gym Get Wrecked by Anonymous HeroBy Mustafa GatollariUpdated Sept. 15 2021, 3:51 p.m. ET Source: istockThe one thing teachers didn't tell me and my fellow classmates growing up in elementary school is that bullies will still try and ruin your life well into adulthood. A woman who was trying to stick to her New Year's weight loss resolution  learned that the hard way when some jerkwads thought it'd be a good idea to film and mock her while she was working out.

item.title: Survivors Recount On Abuja Blast Incident
item.description: Eyewitnesses in Nyanya, FCT, the scene of Monday’s blast that killed many people, have recounted their sad experiences of the incident. Mr. Romanus Ugwu, an Abuja-based journalist, resident at Nyanya, told the News Agency of Nigeria that he ran to the scene on hearing the blast. Ugwu said what he saw could be best described as a “gory sight” because many people were burning in some cars and were calling for help that never came to them while some were on the ground, helpless without limbs.

item.title: Police Offer N10m Reward For Anyone That Can Help With The Arrest Of Crime Suspects In This Photo
item.description: The Nigeria Police Force has announced mouthwatering reward to anyone that could help with useful information to the arrest of suspects whose faces appear in the photo above. The police in a statement signed by its spokesman, Frank Mba, offered the sum of N10million to who ever could help with the arrest of the individuals. Naija News understands that the suspects were captured on a CCTV at an undisclosed crime scene.

item.title: Protesting Ijaw Youths Shut Down NDDC Headquarters In Rivers State
item.description: The headquarters of the Niger Delta Development Commission (NDDC) locate in Port Harcourt, Rivers State has been shut down by protesting youths. The youths in their hundreds under the aegis of the Ijaw Youths Council (IYC) stormed the NDDC office on Thursday and shut down the building. They also hoisted the IYC flag and stopped all human and vehicular entry into the building. The youths also set up two tents in front of the main entrance of the newly-commissioned complex, singing and dancing to solidarity songs.

item.title: Nigerians React As Alozie, Oparanozie Miss Penalties
item.description: The Super Falcons of Nigeria failed to beat ten-woman Lionesses of England in the round of 16 of the 2023 Women’s World Cup hosted by Australia and New Zealand. During the match that lasted for over 120 minutes on Monday, August 7, Nigeria had all the chances to overcome England especially after Lauren James was red carded in the 86th minute but they couldn’t do enough. After 90 minutes of regular football and 30 minutes of extra time, the game ended 0-0 and had to be settled via penalties.

item.title: Fubara: If You Give 'Mumu' Power He Will End Up Playing With It
item.description: The chairman of the Ikwerre Local Government Area of Rivers State, Samuel Nwanosike, has said more Ijaw people have been given federal appointments because of the minister of the Federal Capital Territory (FCT), Nyesom Wike. The Chairman claimed that Wike has been instrumental in getting Ijaw people federal appointments.

item.title: Cristiano Ronaldo In Tears As Morocco Dump Portugal Out Of World Cup (Video)
item.description: Portugal striker, Cristiano Ronaldo couldn’t hold back the tears as he walked down the tunnel after his country’s world cup loss to Morocco on Saturday. The Portuguese team were the favourites to win the game and go into the semi-final stage of the 2022 World Cup tournament in Qatar but they suffered a shock 1-0 defeat in the hands of the African team. Morocco made history by becoming the first African nation to reach the semi-finals of the World Cup following Saturday’s 1-0 victory over Portugal courtesy of a 43rd-minute goal from Youssef En-Nesyri.

item.title: PDP Caretaker Committee Secretary, Other Chieftains Defect To APC In Kebbi
item.description: At least seventeen chieftains of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) defected to the All Progressives Congress (APC) in Kebbi State yesterday, Naija News learnt. The defectors according to reports include former Auditor-General of the party, Alhaji Rabiu Sa’idu, former Secretary, Caretaker Committee of the party, Alhaji Sirajo Ibrahim. Others are said to include executive members of the party. Highlighted in the list is also vice chairman of the LGA, Vice Chairman Bubuche Ward, Umaru Wakkala; Salihu Shayi, Youth Leader; Alhaji Idi Bubuche, Treasurer and Hamza Kilu, Auditor.

item.title: Strike: It Took Me Some Hours To Realize Doctors Were Not Playing 'April Fool' Prank
item.description: The Minister of Labour and Employment, Senator Chris Ngige has submitted that he thought Nigerian doctors were pulling an ‘April Fool’ prank on the federal government when they decided to start their strike on April 1. The Minister was quoted to have made the statement while speaking on Friday during the Nigerian Health Commissioners Forum Quarterly meeting in Abuja. According to him, the resident doctors are to be blamed for the strike action which has paralyzed activities in government hospitals across the country.

item.title: I Am Ready For Political Persecution After Office
item.description: Rivers State Governor, Nyesom Wike has declared that he is anticipating political persecution from opponents once his tenure ends in 2023. He however added that he is prepared for whatever may come his way and has started preparations for such scenarios already. Wike who revealed that he has already moved out of the government house in Rivers even before the expiration of his tenure noted that those in power do not like those who speak the truth but he won’t because of fear bend to anyone’s wishes.

item.title: INEC Declares Winner Of Kebbi Governorship Election
item.description: The Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) has declared the candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Nasiru Idris, winner of the Kebbi State gubernatorial election. Idris was declared the winner by the Returning Officer for Kebbi State on Sunday in Birnin Kebbi, the state capital. The APC candidate defeated the candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) Maj-Gen. Aminu Bande (rtd.). Nasiru polled 409,225 votes to defeat his closest challenger, Bande Aminu, who scored 360,940 votes.

item.title: Why We Can't Honour Invitation
item.description: The Chairman of Titan Trust Bank Limited, Tunde Lemo, and two others have revealed that they would not appear for interrogation today before the Special Investigator probing the activities of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) and Other Related Entities, Jim Obazee. Naija News reports that the trio made this known in a letter on Wednesday to the investigator by their counsel, Prof. Gbolahan Elias (SAN). The other invitees are the two largest ultimate investors in Titan Trust Bank Limited and Union Bank Plc, Cornelius Vink and Rahul Savara.

item.title: Army Confirms Buharis Credentials - Legit.ng
item.description: The controversy trailing the academic qualifications of the Presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress, APC, Major General Mohammadu Buhari, has taken another twist as the Army has dissociated itself from claims that Buhari’s school leaving certificate was never in its records. READ ALSO: Army Speaks On Buhari’s Education Certificates According to Sahara Reporters, military sources have claimed that the Nigerian Army spokesperson who addressed a press conference yesterday, January 20, 2015, to announce that the army could not find General Buhari’s school leaving certificate, had already been redeployed from that post.

item.title: Boko Haram Kills Eight In Borno Village For Giving Nigerian Troops Information
item.description: Boko Haram/ISWAP have killed eight persons in a revenge attack in Biu Local Government Area of Borno State on Saturday night. The terrorists had stormed Mandaragirau and Ghuma villages in Biu Local, where they slaughtered eight residents. it was gathered that the insurgents also left an unconfirmed numbers of persons injured. According Zagazola Makama, nine terrorists on three motorcycles, stormed the villages of Mandaragirau and Ghuma, to wreck havoc, after accusing the locals of disclosing information of their plans to plants mines against the military in the road.

item.title: George Stephanopoulos Earns More in a Year Than Most Earn in a Lifetime

item.title: Man Catches Wife Making Out With Another Man
item.description: The hunter has become the hunted as police arrested a man for attempting to kill his wife’s manfriend. According to reports, the Kenyan citizen had caught a man making love to his wife in a car. Angered by the scenario, the man reached out to his pistol and wanted to shoot his wife’s side lover. Unfortunately for the jilted lover, he was arrested and detained by the Police in Mtwapa, Kilifi County for attempted murder.

item.title: Why Did Jordan Chiles's Score Change at the Olympics?
item.description: Jordan Chiles's Score Changed Earned Her a Bronze Medal for Her Floor Routine"I honestly didn't expect this like whatsoever," Jordan said of the score change. By Sara BelcherPublished Aug. 6 2024, 12:36 p.m. ET Source: Instagram/@jordanchilesU.S. gymnast Jordan Chiles received a bronze medal at the2024 Paris Olympics for her floor routine, but the win was snatched from Romania's Ana Barbosu after a last-minute score change. Though Jordan was initially placed in fifth place after her floor routine performance, her score was changed, resulting in her leaping up two places in the final standings.

item.title: Photos, Names Of Lawmakers That Joined APC From APM In Ogun
item.description: Ogun State Governor, Dapo Abiodun, and other members of the All Progressive Congress in the state on Thursday, January 28 welcome new members from the Allied Peoples Movement (APM). Naija News reports that the Minority Leader of the Ogun State House of Assembly, Ganiyu Oyedeji, alongside six other lawmakers dumped APM to join the Nigeria ruling party in the state. The defectors as revealed by the speaker of the Assembly, Olakunle Oluomo, yesterday include Oyedeji, Musefiu Lamidi (Ado Odo Ota 11), Yusuf Amosun (Ewekoro), Sikiratu Ajibola (Ipokia), Bolanle Ajayi (Yewa South), Adeniran Ademola (Sagamu 11) and Modupe Mujota-Onikepo (Abeokuta North).

item.title: What My Mothers Last Words Before Death Did To Me
item.description: Nigerian ace comedian cum filmmaker, Ayo Makun, popularly known as AY, has revealed how the last words of his mother before her demise shaped his life. Naija News reports that AY while featuring as a guest on the show of Nigerian media personality cum actress, Nancy Isime, recalled the last encounter with his mother when he came home from school to request money. According to the talented comedian, his mother advised him to be responsible and take care of his younger siblings, and the next time he heard from home was the news of his mother’s death.

item.title: Opinion: Kenya Owes No One Apology Over Decision to Shut Down Unrealistic Refugee Camps
item.description: Interior Cabinet Secretary Fred Matiang’i this week revisited the issue of repatriation of refugees that Kenya hosts, declaring a resolution to close down both the Dadaab and Kakuma camps. The 14-day ultimatum, as expected, sparked a swift response from the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR). The matter has been advanced on two occasions in the past but Kenya has never moved to fulfil her intentions in the face of pressure from the international community.

The governor also implored them to be open to all strata of people in the councils, as it was not going to be business as usual.

item.title: U.S. Court Postpones Hushpuppi Sentencing, Release New Date
item.description: The sentencing of self-confessed internet fraudster, Ramon Abbas, popularly known as Hushpuppi, has been postponed by the United States District Court till July 11, 2022. Judge Otis D. Wright in Los Angeles granted the order after the lawyers to Hushpuppi led by Louis Shapiro called for a postponement. Hushpuppi is expected to remain in custody in the intervening period of the delay. Naija News had earlier reported that the sentencing of Hushpuppi was previously fixed for February 14 over his fraudulent activities.

item.title: INEC To Spend N305bn On 2023 General Election [See Breakdown]
item.description: According to the commission, the amount is N116bn higher, compared to N189bn expended on the 2019 general election, Naija News reports. The INEC Charman, Prof. Mahmood Yakubu made the disclosure in Abuja on Thursday during the public presentation of the 2022-2026 Strategic Plan (SP) and the 2023 Election Project Plan (EPP). Yakubu disclosed that the commission will spend N239.2bn to procure voting materials and vehicles for the election and spend N105.2bn to purchase accreditation devices.

item.title: 2023 Presidency: Wait For Another Time
item.description: The Chief Whip of the 9th Senate, Orji Uzor Kalu on Tuesday advised politicians in the South East to wait for another time to contest the presidency. In the build-up to the 2023 general election, there had been calls for the presidency to be zoned to the South East. However, the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), picked their candidate from the North, while the All Progressives Congress (APC) selected their presidential candidate from the South-West.

item.title: Atiku's Wife Makes Huge Promise To Nigerians
item.description: Titi Abubakar, wife of the presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party, Atiku Abubakar, has promised that her husband will give 40 percent of his cabinet to women if elected into power in 2023. She said that her husband was well prepared to rescue the nation and bring it back to working ways. Abubakar made the commitment during the inauguration of the Atiku-Okowa Vanguard Nigeria on Saturday in Abuja. She said: “If my husband is elected, I will do more for Nigerian children and women.

item.title: Presidency Blasts Benue Governor, Labels Him A Failed Politician
item.description: The presidency has lambasted Benue State Governor, Samuel Ortom, describing him as a failed politician always looking for excuses. The senior special assistant to President Muhammadu Buhari on media and publicity, Garba Shehu levelled the allegation against the Benue Governor on Wednesday morning. Shehu in a series of posts via his Twitter account said Ortom has failed woefully as a Governor and politician, adding that it is surprising that even the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) has continued to allow him within its folds.

item.title: The Reason That Rory McIlroy Isn't Wearing a Hat at the Olympics Is Pretty Hilarious

Source: Getty ImagesU.S. gymnast Simone Biles is living proof that every great athlete finds themself in between a rock and a hard place at some point in their career. And for Olympic Golfer Rory McIlroy, that means being forced to choose between his hometown and the town he calls home.

item.title: Is 'The Beast Must Die' Based on a True Story?
item.description: The Film Industry's Most Respected Actor Shares This Connection With 'The Beast Must Die'By Mustafa GatollariPublished July 5 2021, 6:25 p.m. ET Source: AMCFor some reason, people and production studios are obsessed with projects that are based on true stories. Folks will absolutely flip their lids if they discover that there's a slight detail that's off when it comes to a movie that's inspired by true events, but for some reason they'll believe a clickbait news article that cites one dubious dead-link source about COVID vaccines containing time-released microchips that turn people into zombies.

However, instead of the future speedster being Barry Allen (Grant Gustin) and Iris West-Allen's grandson like the character is in the comic books, Bart is the couple's son. Bart is introduced in the DC series in the season 7 finale, making an appearance alongside Iris and Barry's daughter Nora, who first appeared in the show in Season 5.

item.description: - Rais Uhuru Kenyatta amewaonya wote wanaopanga kuiba mtihani wa KCSE kutarajia adhabu kali - Uhuru alieleza kuwa Amina Mohammed aliyemridhi Matiang’i katika wizara hiyo ni mkali zaidi na atapambana na yeyote atakayejaribu kuleta njia za mkato katika wizara hiyo Rais Uhuru alitoa onyo kali Jumatatu, Machi 11 kwa wafisadi waliopo katika wizara ya Elimu ambao wananuia kuhusika katika wizi wa mtihani. item.title: Why Was Urban Meyer Fired? His Jaguars Coaching Tenure Was Fraught
item.description: Urban Meyer Was Fired After Just 13 Games as the Jacksonville Head CoachBy Joseph AllenPublished Dec. 17 2021, 10:48 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesEven terrible head coaches can survive in the NFL for multiple years, so it was something of a shock for many casual football fans to learn that Urban Meyer, the head coach of the Jacksonville Jaguars, had been fired after just 13 games with the team. The team's record was one of the worst in the league at 2-11, but it was off-the-field controversies that ultimately doomed Urban's time with the team.

item.title: Army Arrests Boko Haram Informant That Helped Terrorists Attack Military Base
item.description: The Nigerian Army has confirmed the arrest of a Boko Haram informant that gave out information to terrorists which assisted them in attacking a military base in Yobe State. The spokesperson of the Army, Brigadier General Mohammed Yerima in a statement made available to Naija News on Sunday gave the name of the informant as Modu Ari. The statement added that Ari was arrested by troops of 27 Task Force Brigade attached to Operation Lafiya Dole.

item.title: Brexiter Learns Yorkshire Tea Isn't, in Fact, from Yorkshire
item.description: 'Brexiter' Is Very Disappointed To Learn That Yorkshire Tea Isn't Grown In EnglandBy Mark PygasUpdated Nov. 18 2019, 2:38 p.m. ET Source: iStock / TwitterThe United Kingdom is known for two things — loving tea and having a climate totally inappropriate for growing tea. Most is imported from Africa and Asia, and the British go through about 60.2 billion cups of the stuff every single year. This love isn't new; in 1813, import duty on tea accounted for 10% of the British government’s entire revenue.

item.title: Doyin Okupe Reveals How Atiku, Others Forced Governors, Senators To Dump PDP
item.description: A former aide to ex-president, Goodluck Jonathan, Doyin Okupe, on Tuesday reacted to the defection of Governors and lawmakers from the Peoples Democratic Party to the All Progressives Congress. He noted that the main opposition party was affected due to the decision of the presidential candidate of the party in the 2019 general elections, Atiku Abubakar, to withdrew from the party and travel out after his defeat. Okupe on Twitter wrote, “After the presidential elections in 2019 and the victory of the APC; both at the elections and at the supreme court, the Presidential candidate of the PDP who had gained the leadership of the party by his emergence at the primaries in Port Harcourt withdrew from the party travelled out of the country for quite a while but long enough for the party to become leaderless at the very time that a strong leadership was a political imperative.

item.title: Cocaine Scandal: Why We Can't Parade DCP Abba Kyari
item.description: The National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) has given reasons why the agency cannot parade the suspended former Commander of the Intelligence Response Team (IRT) of the Nigeria Police Force, Deputy Commissioner of Police (DCP), Abba Kyari. In a series of post on its Twitter handle on Sunday, Director of Media and Advocacy, NDLEA, Femi Babafemi, said the agency cannot parade Abba Kyari over drug trafficking allegations because it is not the agency’s custom.

item.title: I Can Tackle Nigeria's Problems - Kwankwaso
item.description: Governor of Kano state, Alhaji Rabiu Musa Kwankwaso has explained why he wants to become president of Nigeria in 2015. Speaking with journalists in Kano yesterday night, Kwankwaso said he has been studying Nigeria’s problems over the years and he has come to realize he possesses the experience and expertise to tackle those issues and bring about a change in Nigeria, Leadership reports. He said he wants to be president so he can address the fundamental socio-economic challenges facing Nigeria, based on the fact that he truly understands what the country needs in order to become great among the comity of nations.

item.title: Oscar Pistorius Was Famous as an Amputee Sprinter Before Becoming a Convicted Murderer
item.description: What happened to Oscar Pistorius's legs? He made history as an amputee athlete before being convicted of murder and sent to prison. Source: Getty ImagesOne might say that Oscar Pistorius has too many titles under his belt. On Feb. 14, 2013, he shot and killed his then-girlfriend, Reeva Steenkamp. He would languish in trials and differing charges for several years, facing several criminal penalties along the way. Despite having served prison time under different convictions, he was most recently sentenced to 13 years and five months in jail in 2017.

item.title: Why Do We Have Daylight Saving Time? Plus, Who Invented It, and More!
item.description: Here's What You Need to Know Before You Turn Your Clocks BackBy Pippa RagaUpdated Nov. 5 2021, 11:23 a.m. ET Source: istockWinter is coming, so prepare to change your clocks back an hour this Sunday, Nov. 7. The practice dates back to the early 20th century. And other than knowing we all get an extra hour of weekend sleep and that it'll get dark super early, there are other things you might have wondered about the first Sunday in November.

item.title: FG Shuts Lagos, Abuja International Airports Over Coronavirus
item.description: The Federal Government has declared it will shut down the Murtala Muhammed International Airport, Lagos; and Nnamdi Azikwe International Airport, Abuja from Monday, March 23, to contain the coronavirus pandemic. Naija News reports that this was disclosed by the Director-General of the Nigerian Civil Aviation Authority (NCAA), Capt. Musa Nuhu, in a statement on Saturday, March 21. This online news platform recalls that three other international airports in Kano, Enugu and Port Harcourt for flight operations were shut on Saturday, leaving the two most important airports in the country open.

item.title: Gunmen Attack Buses On Kogi-Abuja Highway, Abduct Many Passengers
item.description: Some buses travelling from Kogi State to Abuja on Sunday were attacked by a group of armed men, with the passengers taken hostage. Naija News learnt that a man whose wife was among the kidnapped passengers shared his ordeal on social media. He said he could not reach his friends on X and Instagram, so he sent them an email, noting that the kidnappers were demanding the sum of N15 million.

Naija News reports that different political groups have declared support for the presidential ambition of the former Secretary to the Government of the Federation (SGF). This development follows the public declaration of his intention to contest in the upcoming 2023 presidential election on the Peoples Democratic Party platform.

item.title: PDP Endorses Senator Adeleke As Flag Bearer
item.description: The former lawmaker representing Osun west senatorial district, Ademola Adeleke, has been endorsed by the Peoples Democratic Party as its Governorship candidate in the 2022 gubernatorial election in the state. The decision of the party is part of the resolutions arrived at a reconciliatory meeting of the Osun PDP, mediated by the national reconciliation team, headed by its chairman and a former Senate President, Bukola Saraki. The groups from the Osun State Chapter of the party which attended the meeting on Friday agreed that Sunday Bisi will be the recognised chairman of the party in the state.

item.title: Capital Market Authority roles, regulations and contacts
item.description: How well do you know the agencies in your country? Come to think of it, not so many people can tell what some government agencies and regulatory bodies do. One such body whose role remains unknown to many Kenyans is the Capital Market Authority (CMA). CMA is an independent public agency entrenched in Cap 485 A of the constitution and is established by an Act of parliament. It is an arm of the National Treasury and Planning and is meant to supervise, license and monitor capital market activities.

item.title: IPOB Set To Make New Move On Biafran Struggle, Nnamdi Kanu's Detention
item.description: The Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) has revealed the next move towards its struggle for independence and the continued detention of its leader, Nnamdi Kanu by the Nigerian government. In a statement made available to newsmen on Monday, the secessionists revealed that the Head of Directorate of State, Chika Edoziem, will address members via Radio Biafra on Saturday, January 1 by 7:00 PM on the important matters. The statement signed and issued by IPOB’s spokesperson, Emma Powerful, stressed that Edoziem will speak on important matters to chart the struggle for the sovereign Biafra nation.

item.title: Jet Motors Signals Ambition In EV Race, Supplies Locally-Produced Electric Vehicles To Nigerian Govt
item.description: Nigeria’s post-fuel subsidy era appears to be heading the way of electric as the Nigerian government, through the National Automotive Design and Development Council (NADDC), has acquired locally-assembled electric vehicles with their charging infrastructure from Nigerian mobility technology company, Jet Motors, a move that may signal the future of mainstream mobility in the country. The Jet Motor Company was founded in 2018 by Chidi Ajaere, Chairman of the GIG Group which comprises GIG Motors and GIG Logistics, leading brands in the African mobility space.

item.title: South East APC Begins Move To Clinch Senate Presidency, SGF
item.description: The South-East chapter of the All Progressives Congress, APC, has begun moves to secure the positions of the Senate President and Secretary to the Government of the Federation if the party’s presidential candidate Bola Ahmed Tinubu wins the 2023 elections. A top party chieftain in the South-East, informed Punch that a delegation would be meeting with the APC National Chairman, Abdullahi Adamu when he returns to the country. “If the South-West has the presidency while both the North-West and North-East are still negotiating for running mate, it is only fair to allow the South-East take the senate presidency and SGF,” he said.

item.description: English Premier League on Thursday postponed the clash between Tottenham Hotspur and Brighton scheduled for Sunday. The match was cancelled due to a COVID-19 outbreak at the north London club. item.title: 'Welcome to Eden' Was a Hit on Netflix Is Season 2 Coming?
item.description: 'Welcome to Eden' is certainly one of the best options on Netflix for people who love thrillers. Is this haunting show getting a Season 2? Here's an update. Source: NetflixSpoiler alert: This article contains spoilers for Season 1 of Welcome to Eden on Netflix. Not everyone can handle shows that keep you on the edge of your seat, but for those who can, Welcome to Eden is certainly one of the best options on Netflix.

item.title: Benji Miranda - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Superstar on TikTok who racked up more than 21 million likes thanks to his relatable comedy, lip-sync and other types of videos. His username on the platform is benjimanmiranda. Before Fame He was previously known on TikTok as no.other.ben. Trivia He could be found on Snapchat by the username of benjiman_10. He posted a YouTube video called "My first random vlog" in January of 2020. Family Life He featured his father and his German Shepherd in his first YouTube video.

item.title: Emotional Moment Father Cries As He Salutes His Son Who Just Became a US Soldier, Video Stirs Reacti
item.description: A father has shown how proud he is of his son who just got into the US Marine as a commissioned officerIn a video that has gone viral, the happy father praised the son for being respectful to all and making his parenting job easierMany people who reacted to their video said that the clip brought tears to their eyes, adding that the father looked fulfilled PAY ATTENTION: Legit.ng is on a mission to support vulnerable children of Calabar – join the initiative on Patreon, let’s change more lives together!

item.title: Killing of Abuja preacher sparks outrage
item.description: The gruesome murder of a female preacher who was hacked to the death in Abuja has generated outrage among some Nigerians. The 42 year-old mother of seven, Mrs. Eunice Elisha, was a deaconess at the Divine Touch parish of the Redeemed Christian Church of God, (RCCG) Old NEPA Road, Phase 4, Kubwa. She had gone out to evangelize along Gbazango-West area of Kubwa on Saturday moring, July 9, when she was hacked to death by unknown assailants suspected to be extremists.

item.title: Labour Party Drama As Apapa Urges Police To Evict Abure From Secretariat
item.description: In a new twist to the Labour Party (LP) leadership saga, the party’s factional National Chairman, Alhaji Lamidi Apapa, has urged a Federal High Court in Abuja to order the Inspector-General of Police to remove the suspended National Chairman, Julius Abure, from the party’s national secretariat. Apapa and his co-plaintiffs, which include Alhaji Lawal Saleh, the Acting National Secretary, and Comrade Anslem Eragbe, the National Youth Leader, have lodged a suit requesting a permanent injunction to prevent Abure and three other suspended national officers from continuing to claim they are the national chairman and officers of the party.

item.title: COVID-19: Wizara ya Afya Yaripoti Maafa 25, Visa Vingine 1085
item.description: Jumla ya wagonjwa 1,540 wamelezwa katika vituo mbali mbali vya afya kote nchiniMgonjwa mwenye umri wa miaka chini zaidi ni mtoto wa miezi mitatu naye mkongwe ana miaka 100Kenya imerekodi visa vipya 1,085 vya COVID-19 kutokana na sampuli 7,067 zilizopimwa katika saa 24 zilizopita ambapo asilimia mpya ya maambizi iiliyorekodiwa 15.4%. Katika taarifa iliyotolewa Jumanne, Agosti 3, Wizara ya Afya ilisema jumla ya visa vilivyothibitishwa sasa ni 205,356 huku idadi ya sampuli zilizopimwa tangu kisa cha kwanza cha COVI-19 kuripotiwa ikigonga 2,149,376.

item.title: Man United Waweka Historia Kukamilisha Kampeni Bila Kichapo Ugenini
item.description: - Licha ya kupoteza ufalme wa Ligi Kuu kwa mahasidi wao Man City, Ole atajivunia masogora wake kukamilisha kampeni bila kupokezwa kichapo ugenini - Kocha huyo mzawa wa Norway aliteua kikosi imara wakati wa mechi ya mwisho ya msimu dhidi ya Wolves huku akiwapendelea makinda - Makinda hao walitimiza imani na matokeo ya kuridhisha wakisajili ushindi wa 2-1 ugani Molineux - Ushindi wa United uliwashuhudia wakiweka historia wakijiunga na Arsenal kwenye orodha ya vilabu kumaliza kampeni bila kupokezwa kichapo ugenini katika mechi ya EPL

item.title: Nollywood Responsible For Perception Of Grandmothers As Witches Fr Kelvin Ugwu
item.description: A Catholic priest based in Gambia, Fr Kelvin Ugwu, has accused the Nollywood industry of promoting the perception of grandmothers as witches. He also claimed that the industry also initiated the concept that humans or spirits could just disappear and appear in any location they want. Ugwu made the assertion on Wednesday in a post on his Facebook page. He stated that Nollywood promoted the idea that pastors and prophets are the most powerful people to meet once you have any problem.

item.title: Yahoo Boy Arrested For Attempting To Pluck Mother's Eye For 'Ritual Purposes'
item.description: A young man identified as Emma Ereegarnoma has attempting trying to pluck out his mother’s eyes for money rituals to buy Benz in Delta State. According to reports, the suspect who had planned to kill his mother before plucking out her eyes had invited her to his residence on Tuesday, September 14. It was gathered that the petty trader met her son in a very joyous mood with loud music playing from his home theatre.

item.title: Gospel Musician Yinka Ayefele And Wife Welcome 3rd Child
item.description: Nigerian gospel singer Yinka Ayefele and his wife Temitope Titilope have reportedly welcomed their third child. And it is already the third boy of the happy parents who tied the knot in 2000. The newborn was christened on August 6, Nigeriafilms reports. Yinka is one of the most popular gospel artistes in the country, who was among the entertainers at Patience Jonathan's elaborate dinner party held dating back to August, 2013.

item.title: Insecurity: There Is An International Conspiracy Against Nigeria, We Should Appreciate Buhari
item.description: The Governor of Cross River State and presidential aspirant, Ben Ayade, says Nigerians should appreciate President Muhammadu Buhari for tackling criminal elements in the country. Ayade stated that the president has done a lot to curtail the activities of Boko Haram in the North, adding that the Nigerian military has overpowered the insurgents. In an interview on Channels TV on Thursday morning, Ayade said the security challenges in the nation could have been worse if not for the efforts of the Buhari government to address them.

item.title: Nigerian Officials Banned 'Half Of A Yellow Sun' Movie Because Of Biafran War
item.description: The most awaited movie of this year in Nigeria, “Half of a Yellow Sun,” has been banned by the country's film censorship board because the movie partially takes place during the Biafran War. According to the director, Biyi Bandele, the movie scheduled to open in Nigeria last Friday was essentially banned as the country’s film censorship board has refused to issue the movie a certificate. Earlier, Half of a Yellow Sun's premier has been postponed in Nigeria.

item.title: Vanessa Marcil - Age, Family, Bio
Wazee wa Kibukusu wajitayarisha kwa msimu wa kupasha tohara
item.description: -Msimu wa kupasha tohara wa Bukusu ambao ulikuwa umengojewa kwa muda mrefu umeanza ambapo matambiko ya mwanzo yametekelezwa -Upashaji tohara ni moja ya tamaduni za Waluhyia eneo la Magharibi Msimu wa upashi tohara wa Bukusu umeanza ambapo wazee na wapashaji tohara waliobobea wameweka visu na vifaa vingine tayari. Utamaduni huo huwa wa lazima kwa kila mpashaji tohara ili kuepuka kushambuliwa na maroho machafu wanapoendelea na operesheni hiyo. Habari Nyingine: Wasichana mabikira waliisha Kenya – Naibu Jaji Mkuu Philomena Mwilu Hata hivyo, baadhi ya wapashaji tohara walikosolewa kwa kupasha tohara watoto kabla ya 'kusafisha' visu vyao.

item.title: 'I've Had Enough' - Davido's Alleged Fourth Baby Mama, Larissa London Blows Hot
item.description: Larissa London, American model and alleged baby mama to Nigerian singer, David Adeleke popularly called Davido has shared a cryptic post online. Naija News reports that this is coming barely a month after the makeup artist and Davido linked up for the first time since she welcomed her baby, Dawson. However, it looks like Larissa has some things to clear off her chest, following a post shared on her Instagram stories on Wednesday, October 12, 2022.

item.title: Every Primetime Emmy Awards Question You've Ever Had Answered!
item.description: Why are the 2018 Emmy Awards on Monday, plus more of your award show questions answered. Source: Getty ImagesGrab your popcorn because theEmmy Awards are upon us! In case you've been living under a rock, the Primetime Emmy Awards celebrate excellence in television and emerging media. We all know that TV is huge right now. Hello, binge-watching series has become the new norm. We're looking at you, Stranger Things. So, with the crème de la crème of talent upon us, we've rounded up every question you've ever had about Emmy Awards from how to stream the live show to what the Emmy statue actually means — and answered them for you.

item.title: Madozilla - Age, Family, Bio
Ramona Singer - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Became famous for her appearances on the popular Bravo television series The Real Housewives of New York City. Before Fame She attended the Fashion Institute of Technology in New York prior to working in fashion. Trivia Through her appearance on the Bravo show, she was able to create her own line of white wine, Ramona Pinot Grigio. Family Life She had one daughter, Avery, with her husband Mario. She and Mario split in 2014.

item.title: Danica Patrick - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Professional driver who was 2005's Indianapolis 500 and IndyCar Series Rookie of the Year. She became the first female driver to win an IndyCar Series race after coming in first at the 2008 Indy Japan 300. Before Fame She was a cheerleader and babysitter during high school. Trivia Competing in a car sponsored by GoDaddy.com, she began acting in a number of GoDaddy.com commercials during the peak of her fame.

item.title: Osinbajo, Dogara, Shittu Out, Buhari, Amaechi, Fani-Kayode, Zack Orji, Jide Kosoko, Others In [Full
item.description: The presidential campaign council list of the presidential candidate of the ruling All Progressives Congress, Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Tinubu, has been released with several notable names of party chieftains missing. Naija News reports that the 422-man list released on Friday night include APC governors, ministers, lawmakers, ambassadors, actors as well as serving and past public office holders. The list released to newsmen was signed by the Presidential Campaign Council Secretary, James Faleke.

item.title: Why Are There No Mosquitoes in Disney World? Here's What We Know
item.description: No Mosquitoes?! Disney World Is Even More Magical Than You ThoughtBy Mustafa GatollariUpdated June 19 2020, 1:14 p.m. ET Source: InstagramWhile Florida's state bird isn't exactly the mosquito, that distinction belongs to Louisiana, it's still pretty high up there on the list of skeeter-filled areas. The blood-sucking death bugs can turn any fun day into an itchy, scratchy-filled affair that makes you want to rage-quit everything and jump into a tub of calamine lotion.

item.title: Buhari Blames State Governments For Rewarding Bandits With Money, Cars
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has warned state governments to stop the practice of giving cash, cars, and other forms of rewards to bandits in the name of negotiating with them. The President noted that such practices are dangerous and only elevate the level of criminal activities in the country. He added that the actions by such state governments have the potential to backfire with a lot of negative consequences. Buhari rather urged the state and local governments to beef up security in and around schools and other places that may be targeted by the insurgents.

item.title: Datrie - Age, Family, Bio
New York | Famous Birthdays
item.description: New York state is located in the Northeastern region of the US. More than 40% of the state's total population lives in the New York City metro area. New York City is the most populated city in the US. The state's official mammal is the North American beaver. New York was the 11th state to join the Union. Trivia The very first pizzeria to open in the US opened in New York.

item.title: Nkechi Blessing Opens Up On New Lover Breaking Her Heart After Five Months Relationship
item.description: Controversial Nollywood actress, Nkechi Blessing Sunday has spoken about her newfound lover dumping her after five months in their relationship. Nkechi in a video shared on Instagram on Saturday had spoken about getting dumped by her lover. In the video, the actress could be seen crying over her relationship and wondering why her lover would treat her in such a way despite making so many compromises for him. Various reactions trailed the video with many cybernauts speculating that the 33-year-old has once again been served breakfast; a Nigerian slang associated with heartbreak.

item.title: Sai De Silva - Age, Family, Bio
15 Seemingly Harmless Parenting Mistakes With Big Consequences
item.description: Some parenting mistakes can seem harmless but have big consequences. This Ask Reddit thread explores some of the small actions that can stick with kids for their whole lives. Source: ABCThe only guarantee parents can rely on is that, at some point, they're going to screw up and feel like a failure. It's probably a small comfort to know you're not alone — even the most supportive and well-meaning parents will at some point do something to put their kids in therapy.

item.title: Maximilien De Robespierre - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: French left-wing lawyer and member of the Jacobin Club and Committee of Public Safety. He was a leader during the period of the French Revolution known as the Reign of Terror and ordered the execution of thousands of people who he accused of being "enemies of the revolution". Before Fame He was chosen out of five hundred students to deliver a speech welcoming King Louis XVI. Trivia He was guillotined without trial in 1794 thus ending the Reign of Terror, a a period of violence that occurred after the onset of the French Revolution when members of the Committee of Public Safety executed supposed "

item.title: President Buhari Approves Conditional Lifting Of Twitter Ban In Nigeria
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has announced that he has given approval for the conditional lifting of the ban on Twitter operations in Nigeria. The President made the disclosure on Friday morning during his independence day speech to Nigerians. Naija News recalls the federal government had in June 2021, suspended the activities of the micro-blogging site in the country over allegations that the platform was been used to undermine the sovereignty and security of Nigeria.

item.title: Reactions As Policewoman RecitesNational Anthem Wrongly (Video)
item.description: A policewoman has gone viral after she wrongly recited the lyrics of the National Anthem at an event in Imo State. The female police officer led the recitation of the national anthem at the Conference and Retreat for Senior Police Officers in Owerri, the Imo state capital. The retreat, which was attended by senior police and military officers, had the acting Inspector-General of Police, Olukayode Egbetokun, and Governor Hope Uzodinma of Imo in attendance.

item.title: 'Roblox' Players Use This Three Letter Acronym to Respond to Roleplay Requests
item.description: If you're wondering what "ABC" means in 'Roblox' then don't worry, you're not alone. It's used commonly in the game, and we have the answer. Source: YouTubeEvery online community eventually develops its own nomenclature. Whether it's social media platforms or specific games with tons of players, there are phrases that spawn any number of ways. Sometimes they come about from inside jokes that have gotten out of hand, or sometimes they're just short-hand phrases that are specifically developed for popular in-game references.

item.title: Are Royal and Angenette Still Together After 'The Family Chantel'?
item.description: Royal and Angenette Are the New Targets on 'The Family Chantel'By Chrissy BobicUpdated Feb. 12 2021, 12:35 p.m. ET Source: TLCNothing ruins a relationship quite like the unwanted meddling of a spouse’s family. Just ask Chantel Everett and Pedro Jimeno from The Family Chantel, who have shared their own set of problems related to her family butting in on their relationship. Now, Chantel’s older brother, Royal Everett and Angenette, his new wife, are the subject of contention on the show and fans want to know if they’re still together.

item.title: Lance Armstrong - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Seven-time Tour de France champion who was banned from cycling competitions for life by the United States Anti-Doping Agency in 2012. Before Fame He competed in triathlons until joining the Motorola cycling team in 1992. Trivia His LIVE STRONG bracelets raised money for cancer research and awareness, and encouraged people to live life to the fullest. Family Life He had three kids with his first wife, Kristin Richards, who he divorced in 2003.

item.title: Noah Cyrus - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Actress, singer, songwriter, and younger sister of Miley Cyrus. She played Gracie Herbert on the TV series Doc and appeared on Hannah Montana from 2006 to 2010. She also provided the voice of the main character in the animated Hayao Miyazaki fantasy adventure film Ponyo. As a singer, she released her debut single "Make Me (Cry)" featuring Labrinth in 2016. Before Fame She became a young equestrian and began playing the role of Gracie Herbert when she was three years old.

item.title: We Cannot Fight Insecurity Without Good Roads
item.description: The minister of the Federal Capital Territory (FCT), Nyesom Wike has stated that challenges of insecurity and food security cannot be combated without having good roads. He noted that the construction of rural roads would help to address the challenges of insecurity in the FCT, reduce rural-urban migration as well as promote food security in the nation’s capital. The minister stated this on Tuesday during the flagging off of the construction of 5km Naharati-River Ukya-Unguwan Hausawa Road in Abaji Area Council of the territory.

item.title: Aaron Ross - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Cornerback who was selected by the New York Giants in the 2007 NFL Draft. He helped the Giants win Super Bowls XLII and XLVI. Before Fame He was an All-State football and basketball player at John Tyler High School in Texas. Trivia He was named the nation's top defensive back in 2006 and received the Jim Thorpe Award, the same year he played with the Texas Longhorns in the Alamo Bowl. Family Life He married four-time Olympic gold medalist Sanya Richards in 2010 after they dated for seven years.

item.description: Katibu Mkuu wa Muungano wa Vyama vya Wafanyakazi (COTU), Francis Atwoli, amemupoteza shemeji yake baada ya kushambuliwa na kupigwa risasi na watu wasiojulikana. Emmanuel Weyusia ambaye ni nduguye mkubwa mke wa Atwoli, Marry Kilobi, anaripotiwa kushambuliwa na majambazi ambao bado nia yao haijajulikana. item.title: The Sky Stretches on for 'Big Sky' as a Season 3 Is Definitely Happening
item.description: Season 2 of ABC’s ‘Big Sky’ is coming to a close, but will there be a Season 3 of the popular series? We have all the details about a potential release date. Source: ABC Ever since Big Sky pulled a Hitchcock in Season 1 by killing off a main character before the show had time to get going (hello Janet Leigh in Psycho), we knew it wouldn't play by the rules.

item.title: Wiper to Discipline 5 MCAs who Visited William Ruto at His Karen Residence
item.description: The ward representatives were accused of flouting the Political Parties ActMachakos County Assembly Speaker Florence Mwangangi said the Opposition outfit would take action against the county assembly membersIn November 2020, Jubilee suspended three nominated Nairobi County Assembly members for disregarding the role of the party in various assembly mattersThe Wiper party, led by Kalonzo Musyoka, has said it will discipline five ward representatives who visited Deputy President William Ruto at his Karen residence.

item.title: Breakdown Of Ivory Coast's Players, Coaches' Reward After Winning 2023 AFCON
item.description: Ivory Coast were completely ruled out of being in contention for the 2023 AFCON title after an abysmal group-stage campaign. Recall that under their French coach, Jean-Louis Gasset, the Elephants of Ivory Coast managed to beat Guinea-Bissau in their opening game. Afterward, they suffered back-to-back defeats against Nigeria and Equatorial Guinea. Due to the abysmal run, the Ivorian FA sacked the coach and replaced him with their former international, Emerse Fae, who was Gasset’s assistant coach.

item.title: Lawyer Bamidele Aturu Was Laid To Rest In Ondo
item.description: Popular Nigerian lawyer, Bamidele Francis Aturu, was buried today, July 25, in his country-home of Ogbagi Akoko, Ondo State. Mr. Aturu’s remains were laid in state briefly at Ajatu High School in Ogbagi Akoko, with his professional colleagues, fans and family extolling his life and work. A lot of worm words were said, Mr. Aturu was presented as a deeply principled lawyer. In his sermon, Pastor Bamidele Olotu of the Redeemed Christian Church of God (RCCG), reminded all mourners that death was certain for all humans, regardless of how mighty or low they were on earth.

item.title: Moms Sad $70 Walmart Grocery Haul Shocks Internet
item.description: “$70.00 Worth of Groceries in 2023” – Mom’s Walmart Cart Shows Reality of Inflation for FamiliesBy Mustafa GatollariPublished Nov. 7 2023, 3:28 p.m. ET Source: TikTok | @neverblue1978The global economy hasn't been doing so hot since the post-pandemic boom. Inflation hit a 41-year-high in the US, and our country's been embroiled in two massive global conflicts putting even further strain on national resources, leaving many families struggling to pay for basic necessities like food and housing.

item.title: Super Eagles Legend, Sunday Oliseh Speaks On Returning To Manage Super Eagles
item.description: Super Eagles legend, Sunday Oliseh, has revealed that he would consider managing the Nigerian senior men’s team again if the right conditions are met. Naija News recalls that the former midfielder briefly led the Super Eagles Between July 2015 and February 2016. Oliseh, during his time as the team’s coach, had a tense relationship with the Nigeria Football Federation (NFF). The 49-year-old was also reported to have had confrontations with senior club players.

item.title: Who Is the Knight on 'The Masked Singer'? (SPOILERS)
item.description: Who Is Under the Knight's Helmet on 'The Masked Singer?' (SPOILERS)By Tatayana YomaryUpdated Sept. 21 2022, 8:56 p.m. ET Source: FoxBaby... Season 8 of Fox's The Masked Singer is coming in hot with the talent, vocal skills, and of course, the masks! Fans of the show all know that famous names are behind the innovative and gorgeous costumes, but coming to a general consensus on who is the voice behind the masks proves to be tricky as each week passes.

item.title: Atlanta' Cast Plus, How to Watch
item.description: Joseline Hernandez of 'Love & Hip Hop' has a new show on Zeus Network called 'Joseline's Cabaret' where she wants to start a new dance show. We all remember back in 2017 when Joseline Hernandez quit Love & Hip Hop: Atlanta. It was iconic and even after years of being "managed" by her man at the time, Stevie J, the Puerto Rican Princess left him and the show, despite them having a daughter together.

item.title: Does 'Rise of Skywalker' Have an After-Credits Scene? Find Out Here
item.description: Should You Stick Around for an After-Credits Scene Once 'Rise of Skywalker' Is Finished?By Mustafa GatollariUpdated Dec. 20 2019, 12:54 p.m. ET Source: LucasfilmWARNING: The following contains some spoilers for Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker. Post-credits scenes are all the rage these days, thanks mainly to Marvel. But as it turns out, superhero movies aren't the only films out there employing the use of post-credit teasers. Usually they hint at the prospect of a sequel or shed some further light on the events of the film.

Although he used the photo legally, he didn't get Halle Berry's permission. Halle Berry posted about it on Instagram. There's nothing we love better than celebrity drama and gossip.

item.title: List of professional bodies in Nigeria with accreditation
item.description: Professional bodies and institutions are established for regulatory purposes. They decide, maintain, and regulate the ethics of practice and conduct of professionals in their respective profession. Below is a list of professional bodies in Nigeria with accreditation. There are many professional bodies in Nigeria today. Professions like accounting, engineering, banking, surveyor, medicine, etc. all have professional bodies, associations, and institutions in Nigeria. Being a member of a professional body in your profession is very important.

item.title: Ryan Beatty - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Pop singer and internet celebrity who released the #7 EP Because Of You in 2012. His single "Hey LA" was used in an AT&T anti-texting while driving advertisement campaign. Before Fame He began uploading cover videos to YouTube in 2009 when he was fourteen. His first single was called "Every Little Thing." Trivia He was nominated for the 2012 Teen Choice Award for Choice Web Star. Family Life He has five siblings named Stacey, Lauren, Brooke, Jenni and Kenny.

item.title: Hamza Al-Mustapha Consults Wike Over Presidency (Photos)
item.description: The Presidential candidate of the Action Alliance (AA), Hamza Al Mustapha on Monday visited the Rivers State Governor, Nyesom Wike. The former Chief Security Officer (CSO) to ex-military head of state, Sani Abacha, met with Wike at his Port Harcourt residence. Naija News learnt that Al Mustapha arrived at the residence of Wike at about 4.30 pm and proceeded to a closed-door meeting. Mustapha met with Governor Wike as part of his consultation for the 2023 Presidential election.

item.title: Levinhotho - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Lip-sync, comedy and vlogging personality on the platform TikTok who has accrued more than 5 million fans for his levinhotho account. He was once known on the platform as levin.hto. He posted a TikTok video of himself cutting his own hair and it has been viewed over 1.3 million times. Before Fame His first Instagram picture saw him surfing on the beaches of Fuerteventura, Canarias, Spain. Trivia He created a side photography Instagram account called levinsphotography.

item.title: Stan Zuray on 'Yukon Men' Left Boston to Live in Solitude for 40 Years
item.description: The 'Yukon Men' star Stan Zuray left Boston to live a life of solitude some 40 years and is now a cast member on the Discovery channel show. There are some people who yearn to live life out in the wilderness and never turn back, and I can understand that. For the most part, people are awful. Think about how many times you let yourself down on a daily basis, and now multiply that by the entire human population.

item.title: Dr. Karamo Chilombo: 10 quick facts about Jhene Aiko's dad
item.description: Dr. Karamo Chilombo, otherwise known as Dr. Chill, is a trained American medical specialist and singer. He is popularly known as the father of singers Jhene Aiko and Mila J. His love for what he does is among the main reasons why many of his fans would love to know more about him. Doctor Chilombo is, undeniably, not your ordinary doctor. His inspirational posts on social media and music will leave you baffled.

item.title: Obaseki Used Adams Oshiomhole As Godfather In 2016
item.description: The Governorship candidate of the All Progressives Congress, Osagie Ize-Iyamu, on Tuesday, accused the governor of Edo State, Godwin Obaseki of using Adams Oshiomhole to achieve his first term ambition. He said this while speaking during an interview on a programme, ‘This Morning’ monitored by Naija News on TVC. The former governorship candidate of Peoples Democratic Party further stated that the suspended National Chairman of the party, Oshiomhole used all his power in 2016 to get Obaseki into power.

item.title: PDP Postpones North-West Zonal Congress
item.description: Nigeria’s main opposition party, the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) has postponed it’s North-West Zonal Congress earlier scheduled for Saturday, February 12, 2022. In a terse statement released on Friday (today) the party’s National Working Committee said a new date will be made public in due course. Naija News observed that the party did not state the reason for the postponement of the congress. The statement issued by the party’s National Organising Secretary, Umar Bature said, “The National Working Committee of the Peoples Democratic Party wishes to announce the postponement of our scheduled North-West Zonal Congress earlier slated for Saturday, February 12, 2022.

item.title: Who Does the Mexican TikTok Star Date? Details

But many followers of the Mexican lip-sync and choreography star have been wondering whether Domelipa has a boyfriend and who exactly he is.

item.title: Wike Declares Himself As The PDP Presidential Candidate
item.description: Rivers State Governor, Nyesom Wike has declared himself as the 2023 presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). Naija News reports Wike made the boast ahead of the party’s primary election which has been scheduled for May 29, 2022. According to the Governor, he can no longer be referred to as an aspirant because he believes he has done enough to emerge the PDP candidate and the delegates will give him the needed votes to win the party’s ticket.

item.title: Tinubu Declares State Of Emergency On Food Security
item.description: President Bola Tinubu has announced a state of emergency on food security within Nigeria. This information was conveyed by the Presidential spokesman, Dele Alake during a press briefing at the State House on Thursday. The President has called for all matters related to the availability and affordability of food and water, which are critical for daily living, to be handled by the National Security Council. This directive aligns with the Tinubu administration’s commitment to support the most vulnerable citizens.

item.title: Viral Video Of Senator Ademola Adeleke Promising Voters Money In Different Currencies
item.description: A viral video has shown Osun state governorship aspirant Senator Ademola Adeleke telling a crowd that he has come with lot of money to give voters. The senator who is an uncle to popular Nigerian singer Davido is contesting the governorship election under the umbrella of the People’s Democratic Party (PDP). Speaking during a campaign Adeleke informed the crowd that he arrived with different currencies for them. He said: “If it’s about money, I have come with money,” Senator Adeleke says in Yoruba while patting his pocket.

item.title: 'How Can You Cry Because Of A Woman'
item.description: Former presidential aide Reno Omokri has condemned men who cry over women. Reno revealed via Twitter that when a man cries over a woman who leaves him it is interpreted as a sign of weakness. He wrote: “When a man cries over the death of loved ones, he gains respect. But if he cries because a woman left him, or rejected his proposal, he projects weakness. How can you cry because of a girl?

item.title: 'Tinubu Is Like A Quack Doctor Likely To Kill His Patients'
item.description: Phrank Shaibu, the Special Assistant on Public Communications to former Vice President Atiku Abubakar, has issued a stern warning about the potential impacts of President Bola Tinubu’s policies on Nigeria’s population. In a statement released in Abuja on Thursday, Shaibu expressed grave concerns, stating that if hunger does not decimate Nigeria’s population, President Tinubu’s “shambolic policies” certainly will. Shaibu’s criticism comes amidst growing dissatisfaction with the current administration’s handling of economic and social policies.

item.title: BREAKING: President Buhari arrives in Edo for APC mega rally (Photo)
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has arrived in Benin City, Edo state capital to campaign for All Progressives Congress (APC) ahead of state governorship election. Bashir Ahmad, presidential media aide on the new media, reports that Buhari’s aircraft landed at 10:20 am. President Buhari is expected to visit the Crown Prince of Benin Kingdom, Eheneden Erediauwao, before attending the mega rally. READ ALSO: Buhari, Osinbajo to attend APC rally in Edo state The rally is to hold at the Samuel Ogbemudia Stadium in Benin City, the Edo state capital.

item.title: Buhari Has Laid The Foundation, My Husband Will Continue Fixing Nigeria
item.description: The senator representing Lagos central, Mrs Remi Tinubu, who is the wife of the All Progressives Congress (APC) presidential candidate, Bola Tinubu has urged Nigerians to vote for her husband as the next president of the country. She said Tinubu has the capacity to fix the challenges facing Nigeria and has demonstrated his ability with what he achieved during his tenure as the Lagos State Governor. Speaking further, Mrs. Tinubu praised the administration of President Muhammadu Buhari for doing a good job in repositioning Nigeria.

item.description: President Bola Tinubu has said his administration will not rest until agents of darkness causing insecurity in the country are completely eliminated. Tinubu spoke on Tuesday at the official unveiling of the book titled “Working with Buhari, Reflections of a Special Adviser, Media and Publicity (2015-2023)”, which was written by Femi Adesina, the former spokesperson to former President Muhammadu Buhari. The President added that any unresolved challenges faced by President Buhari in his eight years, his administration will endeavour to resolve them.

item.description: In the dying moments of a tense match on Thursday (today), Patrik Schick’s powerful header secured a 2-2 draw for Bayer Leverkusen against Qarabag in the Europa League. Naija News reports that this result extends Leverkusen’s impressive unbeaten streak to 35 games. Despite their unbeaten record, Xabi Alonso’s side trailed 2-0 at halftime in their last-16 clash in Azerbaijan. Yassine Benzia and Juninho scored for the home team, which had previously been defeated twice by Leverkusen in the group stages.

item.description: Different people opt to farm different crops based on their assessments of the productivity vs. input required. Whit this analysis in mind, it will be possible to justify the dominance of bean farming in the country. The crop features among those commonly grown in Kenya especially during rainy seasons. This guide will help point interested farmers in the right direction as far as beans farming is concerned.

item.description: Supporters of the presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Bola Tinubu and the Governor of Lagos State, Babajide Sanwo-Olu on Sunday held a 5-Million man walk in Lagos State. Despite heavy downpours in the early hours of Sunday, the chairman of Lagos State Parks and Garages Management Committee, Musiliu Akinsanya, popularly known as MC Oluomo, led different groups during the walk. The rally which was sponsored by MC Oluomo witnessed a large number of supporters who converged on Teslim Stadium and National Stadium, Surulere.

item.title: Yerima Speaks On Gentleman Agreement For Tinubu To Take Over After Buhari
item.description: Former Zamfara State Governor and presidential aspirant, Ahmed Yerima says “there is no ‘gentleman agreement’ that allows Asiwaju Bola Tinubu to lay claim to the All Progressives Congress (APC) presidential ticket for 2023. Yerima claimed the APC never entered into any agreement with Tinubu to become the next leader of the country after President Muhammadu Buhari. He observed that any agreement (if any) the former Lagos State Governor might have had with any person(s) or group ahead of the 2015 presidential election is not binding on the party because, in his view, an agreement between persons is different from an agreement by the party.

item.description: World Series of Poker Champion Doyle Brunson Dies at 89By Chrissy BobicMay 15 2023, Updated 8:45 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesWhether you're immersed in the world of professional poker or not, there's a good chance you've heard 10-time World Series of Poker champion Doyle Brunson's name associated with the game. The sergeant first class in the army, A.M Linus and his lance corporal wife were on their way to Imo State when the gunmen shot them and beheaded them. It was gathered that the gunmen after beheading the couple called their family members to mock them.

item.title: Wike Reveals Why Peter Obi Dumped PDP, His Possible Next Move
item.description: Presidential aspirant and the Governor of Rivers State, Nyesom Wike has revealed why the former Governor of Anambra State, Peter Obi dumped the Peoples Democratic Party. Recall that Peter Obi tendered his resignation letter on Wednesday, stating that the practices of the party make it impossible for him to remain in the party. Wike while speaking on Channels TV said Obi left the party because he does not have the chance of winning the presidential ticket of the party.

item.title: How Akande Helped Chase PDP Out Of Aso Rock In 2015
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has appreciated the former interim National Chairman of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Bisi Akande, for his contribution in unseating the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) government. The Nigerian leader submitted that Akande was steadfast in his quest in ensuring that APC takes over power from the then ruling party, PDP in 2015. He stated that Akande helped fuse together different parties that became APC in 2013 and dislodge PDP from governance.

item.title: How to Use Mastodon, a Social Media Alternative to Twitter

item.title: Self-acclaimed Living God In Kenya 'Jehovah Wanyonyi' Dies Of Malaria (Photos)
item.description: Self-acclaimed 98-year-old living god in Kenya, Jehovah Wanyonyi,  is dead. According to reports, the self-proclaimed god who lived in Chemororoch village in Uasin Gishu County, western Kenya died from malaria on July 18 on his way to Cherangany Nursing Home in Kitale town. Standard Digital reports that although the family of the man claims their father, who is husband to many, is still alive, local administrators say Jehovah Wanyonyi passed away on July 18.

item.title: Julin Figueroa - Curiosidades, Familia, Biografa
item.description: Acerca De Hijo del reconocido cantante Joan Sebastian que se hizo un nombre propio como compositor y cantante de música ranchera. Lanzó cuatro álbumes propios a lo largo de su corta carrera. Su tema "Un Idiota" ha acumulado más de 290,000 reproducciones. Falleció a la temprana edad de 27 años, luego de un infarto agudo de miocardio. Antes de la Fama Nació de la unión de Joan Sebastian y la ganadora del Miss Costa Rica 1978 y concursante del Miss Universo, Maribel Guardia.

item.title: NERC Awaits Tinubu's Approval For New Electricity Tariff Plan
item.description: The Nigerian Electricity Regulatory Commission (NERC) is awaiting the go-ahead from President Bola Tinubu to announce a new electricity tariff regime. The adjustment, expected to result in an increase, is part of the twice-yearly review of the Multi-Year Tariff Order (MYTO). This review comes on the heels of the devaluation of the Naira, Nigeria’s currency. According to an unnamed source at the Commission who spoke with Vanguard, the review is completed and its results have been sent to the President for approval.

item.title: People Are Not Feeling the Chubby Face Filter on TikTok (and for Good Reason)
item.description: The chubby face filter on TikTok has recently become a trend. It alters people's faces to show what they would look like if they gained weight. Source: TikTokNew effects and filters come out on TikTok all the time to keep up with the ever-changing trends on the app. While many of them are harmless, the Chubby Face trend is being labeled as fatphobic. Though filters have become commonplace on social media for people to hide their imperfections, they have become polarizing because they can set an unrealistic and unattainable standard for others.

item.title: Police Disperse Sunday Igboho Supporters In Ibadan
item.description: Armed policemen on Wednesday dispersed supporters of Sunday Adeyemo, aka Sunday Igboho, who staged a protest in Ibadan against his arrest. It was gathered that the armed policemen had taken over the place which the protester had converged around 3.30 pm. The policemen stationed themselves at strategic positions at the location. After clearing the traffic, they stayed for a while before they finally left. Naija News had earlier reported that Sunday Igboho was arrested at Cotonou Cadjehoun Airport with his wife on their way to Germany on Monday night.

item.title: 60% Nigerians Can't Afford New Cars
item.description: The federal government has been urged to review its policy on the importation of vehicles into Nigeria considering the masses, Naija News reports. This is as the acting National President of the Association of Nigerian Licensed Customs Agents, Kayode Farinto, lamented recent hitches encountered with the Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) introduced by the government. It was observed that since the introduction of the electronic system for the valuation of imported vehicles, the platform has been riddled with controversies that have made vehicles almost inaccessible to ordinary Nigerians.

item.title: Rhodes-Vivours Emergence As Lagos LP Guber Candidate Challenged By Salvador
item.description: The emergence of Gbadebo Rhodes-Vivour as the Labour Party’s governorship candidate in Lagos State for the 2023 poll has suffered setback. Naija News earlier reported that the former senatorial candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) emerged as LP gubernatorial candidate in Lagos in an election held on Wednesday. Rhodes-Vivour polled 111 votes to beat his only opponent, Hon. Moshood Adegoke Salvador, who scored 102 votes. The primary for the replacement of the LP governorship candidate was witnessed by the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC).

item.title: VP Osinbajo, Senate President Lawan, Other Top Govt Officials Storm Daura For Turbaning Of Yusuf Buh
item.description: Vice President Yemi Osinbajo, Senate President Ahmad Lawan, and other top government functionaries were among the dignitaries that stormed Daura, Katsina State on Saturday for the turbaning ceremony of President Muhammadu Buhari’s son, Yusuf. Some other lawmakers as well as the Katsina State Governor, Aminu Bello Masari, Kano State Governor, Abdullahi Ganduje were also in attendance at the event. As earlier reported by Naija News, Yusuf, son of President Muhammadu Buhari, is now the new District Head of Kwasarawa, Duara in Katsina State.

Rudik while speaking on the negotiation noted the anticipated attacks from Russia during the peace talk because of the words of the President of Russia, Vladimir Putin cannot be trusted. The lawmaker while speaking with CNN said, “Tonight, there was ‘peaceful negotiations,’ that resulted in heavier airstrikes right after the negotiation ended up.

item.title: Danyon Loader - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: New Zealand former world-class swimmer who won gold medals for his home country in the 200 and 400 meters at the 1996 Summer Olympics. During his career, he set world records in the 200 meter butterfly and 400 meter freestyle . Before Fame He was born in the port city Timaru. Trivia He competed on the second season of the New Zealand edition of Dancing with the Stars. Family Life He is the youngest of four children.

item.title: Gunmen Murder Ex-security Aide To Patience Jonathan
item.description: News reaching us indicates that Tamuno Jacob Igbomie, a former security aide to Patience Jonathan, has been shot dead by unknown gunmen. In a report published on The Punch, the deputy superintendent of police corpse was found in his Honda Accord car last Friday along the Airport Road, Abuja. It was gathered that Igbomie was shot by his assailants at point-blank range in his car who left the engine running after committing the dastardly act.

item.description: Member of the million subscriber club on YouTube who is best known for her channel itsjudytime. She is a beauty guru who posts about "First Impressions" of new beauty products and creates tutorials. She also started the JMK Collection, a home and fashion company for women, and was inspired to do so because of her daughters.  Before Fame She was studying at the University of Washington when she posted a how-to hair video on YouTube.

Centered around Jason Sudeikis's loveable soccer coach, viewers watched as the comedian showcased his charming personality while at the helm of a British soccer team.

item.title: I Am Ready To Fight Boko Haram Sunday Igboho
item.description: Yoruba activist Sunday Adeyemo, also known as Sunday Igboho, has said he has what it takes to defeat Boko Haram insurgents. In a video interview released in 2020, Igboho said he was ready to fight Boko Haram without the government’s support. He said: “That which I will use in the fight against Boko Haram, I have it already.” Speaking further, Igboho claimed that the Western Nigeria Security Network, also known as Amotekun, will be ineffective under government control.

item.title: Former Big Brother Naija Housemate Turns 'Beggar', Publicly Solicits For Funds
item.description: Former BBNaija housemate Ella Nnabuchi has unashamedly sought out for funds from the general public following the economic hardship in the country. The reality star who decided to quit music months after her appearance on the show in 2019, posted her bank details via her verified Instagram page on Thursday. According to her, she wasn’t going to stop until her helper finds her. Speaking about the reason behind her decision to solicit for funds publicly, the reality star hinted that, her brand needs rebranding, hence the urgent need for money.

item.title: APC Deputy Governorship Candidate, Afuye Wins Polling Unit
item.description: The Deputy governorship candidate of the All Progressives Congress, Mojisola Afuye, has won her polling unit in the ongoing governorship election in Ekiti State. Afuye voted at Atiba Aafin Ward 1, unit 003, in Ikere Ekiti. The ruling party gathered a total of 165 votes to defeat SDP and PDP, who polled 3 and 7 votes respectively. The candidate of the African Democratic Congress, Wole Oluyede, who is an indigene of Ikere Ekiti, polled 27 votes.

item.title: Atiku Abubakar Fortifies Media Team, Makes Fresh Appointments
item.description: Former Vice President and presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) for the 2023 general elections, Atiku Abubakar, on Tuesday, approved the appointment of three additional aides to his media team. Naija News reports that the appointment was made known in a statement signed by Paul Ibe,  Atiku’s Media Adviser. The names of the three new media aides are Eta Uso, Abdulrasheed Shehu, and Demola Olanrewaju. This newspaper reports that their appointments take immediate effect.

item.title: Burna Boy's Convoy Involved In Hit-And-Run, Tells Fan To 'F*ck Off'
item.description: A fan of Burna Boy, Samuel O, has narrated an accident involving his car and the singer’s convoy on Saturday night in Lagos State. In a post on Twitter, Samuel, who also goes by the name Duke of Lagos on the social media platform, said his car was hit at Lekki Phase One while waiting for the traffic light to turn green. What pained Samuel more was that Burna boys told him to ‘f–ck off”.

item.title: Cabinet Reshuffle: Eugene Wamalwa Named New Defence CS, Charles Keter Moved to Devolution
item.description: In the reshuffle, Monica Juma was moved from the Defence Ministry to the Ministry of Energy and PetroleumCharles Keter replaced Eugine Wamalwa as the new Devolution Cabinet SecretaryIn the principal secretaries reshuffle, Gordon O. Kihalangwa was named the new State Department for Energy PSPresident Uhuru Kenyatta has reshuffled his cabinet, reassigning some cabinet secretaries and principal secretaries to different ministries. In an announcement made by the State House spokesperson Kanze Dena on Wednesday, September 29, Eugine Wamalwa was named the new Defence Cabinet Secretary.

item.title: Dumo Lulu-Briggs Declares Intention To Succeed Wike In Rivers
item.description: Oil mogul Chief Dumo Lulu-Briggs has announced his intention to contest in the Rivers governorship election in 2023. Naija News reports that Lulu-Briggs made this known on Friday on arrival at Pot Harcourt International Airport, Omagwa from Abuja. According to the business tycoon, he will win the contest because of his enomous good works in the State. Dumo Lulu-Briggs is a lawyer and Chairman of Platform Petroleum. He is the son of late billionaire and founder of Moni Pulo Limited, O.
